name: realtime-collaboration-board
description: A scalable real-time collaboration platform built using Next.js (frontend) and Node.js + Socket.io (backend) with Redis Pub/Sub for multi-instance synchronization and MongoDB for persistent storage. Implements room-based collaboration, JWT authentication, live cursors, shared canvas state, and conflict-free updates.

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
